DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) profile monomethyl fumarate ( MMF ) follow delivery BG00012 ( dimethyl fumarate , DMF ) 120 mg ( Part 1 ) BG00012 240 mg ( Part 2 ) varying region within GI tract healthy volunteer . The secondary objective study evaluate safety tolerability profile follow delivery BG00012 120 mg ( Part 1 ) BG00012 240 mg ( Part 2 ) varying region within GI tract healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy male nonpregnant , nonlactating healthy female . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 . Subjects childbearing potential ( include male ) must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception 90 day last dose study treatment Key History positive test result Screening human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody , hepatitis B virus ( define positive hepatitis B surface antigen [ HBsAg ] hepatitis B core antibody [ HBcAb ] ) . Serious infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , septicemia ) within 3 month prior first dose . Vaccinations within 4 week prior first dose . History drug alcohol abuse ( define Investigator ) within previous 2 year , regular alcohol consumption male > 21 unit per week female > 14 unit per week ( 1 unit = Â½ pint beer , 25 mL 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) . History clinically significant gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease determine Investigator ( include Crohn 's Disease , Ulcerative Colitis , confirm diagnosis active Irritable Bowel Syndrome ) . History clinically significant cardiac , endocrinologic , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . NOTE : Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
